channel.title: Could my request be simpler? =D
channel.description:
well all I need this script to do is follow one color with the mouse. just one color, no clicking, no stopping, just following that one color. I know scar well enough to get the color myself I just need a script that makes the mouse stay over that one color. (the mouse will have to be fast because sometimes that color is fast and sometimes its slow)
should be easy enough right? well I sure hope it is
~sy

item.title: Could my request be simpler? =D
item.dc:creator: @Smartzkid Smartzkid
item.description:
@Smartzkid wrote:

[quote]
program new;
var
x,y:integer;
begin
repeat
findcolor(x,y,000000,1,1,1600,1400); //put the color in the place of 000000
movemousesmooth(x,y); //change to movemouse if it’s too slow
wait(10);
until(isfkeydown(12))
end;

Read full topic
